name: B. Plus from Picture
statement:
You have a given picture with size w
times h. Determine if the given picture has a single "" shape or not. A
"" shape is described below: A "" shape has one center nonempty cell.
There should be some (at least one) consecutive non-empty cells in each
direction (left, right, up, down) from the center. In other words, there
should be a ray in each direction. All other cells are empty. Find out
if the given picture has single "" shape.
